message: So 125 special Less Confers got a Mighty Bean, cute huh?  You know, our company name is Four Bean Soup, you know its cute!  Just admit it.
Tomorrow morning we will announce the WINNING BEAN!
Have fun in the next 24 hours swapping and trading these awesome beans.  Use this room to help facilitate it.

What do you get if you have the winning bean?  A $50 gift card!  Yes, we know, its awesome.  You get an awesome toy like the geek mighty bean and a chance at goodies.  We can't help it, we are awesome at Four Bean Soup!
